address.full: Jalan Kaliurang KM 9, Sleman, Yogyakarta, Indonesia

description: We are a supplier providing a wide variety of high-quality candles, including aromatherapy candles, souvenir candles, colored candles, decorative candles, worship candles, spiritual candles, candle manufacturing, and many more. We offer beautiful decorative candles as souvenirs that are perfect for any event. From weddings to corporate events or travel occasions, our decorative souvenir candles are the perfect choice to create unforgettable memories.

features.souvenir_description: With our decorative souvenir candles, you can bring home beautiful memories from your events or travels. Each candle is crafted with high-quality materials and beautifully decorated by our artists.

quality_section.product_quality_description: We only use high-quality materials to create our decorative candles, and each of our products is tested to ensure safety and durability. We also have a talented team of artists who decorate each candle with beautiful and unique designs, making them special souvenirs.
quality_section.size_and_color_description: Our decorative candles come in a variety of sizes, from small and portable to large and beautiful. We also offer a range of colors including white, blue, green, red, and more to match your event theme.
quality_section.calming_aroma_description: Our decorative candles also provide a soothing aroma, bringing peace and tranquility into any room. We use high-quality fragrance oils to deliver a lasting and pleasant scent.

You will also find inspiring stories about how candles can be a symbol of hope and warmth in everyday life. Letâ€™s explore the magic of candles together and learn how to use them to light up our lives.

about_us.content:
# About Codeverta

Codeverta is a candle company from Yogyakarta that offers a variety of candles with unique and high-quality designs. We use premium materials and good manufacturing techniques to create beautiful and fragrant candles.

We offer a wide selection of candles, from small ones to large ones that can be used for special events such as weddings, birthday parties, church ceremonies, or power outages. In addition, we also provide scented candles that can create a calming atmosphere in your home.

We have a variety of colors and designs that can be customized to your taste. We can also create candles with designs that match your preferences.

We highly value customer quality and safety, so we always strive to use safe and environmentally friendly materials.

If you want to add a romantic touch to your home or are looking for a unique gift for a special occasion, don't hesitate to visit our website and check out the candles we offer. We would be happy to help you find the perfect candle for your needs.
